title: Workshop on Pedagogical Strategies for Supporting Students with Disabilities Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage proficiency and general understanding of special education
context.additional_context: Hands-on workshop on creating and applying generative AI-based personalized learning materials in a VR simulation environment primarily conducted via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can produce three or more types of customized language learning materials tailored to the needs of students with disabilities using generative AI tools
Learners can accurately evaluate the applicability of generative AI-based learning materials in VR simulation environments with over 80% accuracy
Learners can categorize and explain a collaborative instructional design process between learners and AI in four or more stages

resources: Generative AI Web Interface Access Permissions
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
